title: The Fun of Festivals is…?
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Hey, Kanan-chan, is my yukata still on right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s fine, it’s fine~. Yukatas don’t get undone that easily.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Phew~ Since I’ve got this yukata on, I’ve gotta enjoy the festival!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Why don’t we try yo-yo fishing or goldfish scooping?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ooh, festival staples! I wanna try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hehe, alright, I’ll teach you the trick to goldfish scooping then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Really!? Please do, Kanan-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Come on, let’s go to that stall right away...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ahhhhh! Kanan-chan, Kanan-chan, there’s some candied apples over there! Let’s go and eat some first~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Function over aesthetic, huh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
